import errorsCodesMsg from"../configs/errorsCodesMsg";import labels from"../configs/label";// Build error message using input name and error code from backend
var buildErrorMsg=function buildErrorMsg(code,attribute){var errorMsg;if(attribute===null){errorMsg="".concat(errorsCodesMsg[code]);}else{errorMsg="[Champ ".concat(labels[attribute],"] : ").concat(errorsCodesMsg[code]);}return errorMsg;};export default buildErrorMsg;
